data.name: Project WW (TBA)
data.detailed_description:
"Look around carefully, human. Is this the world you are so keen on defending with your life?"

A Roguelike experience with physics based combat, telling the tale of a Human, a Demon and their intertwined Fate.

Create your character and get dragged into a menacing journey that will shape your future, past and present.

Features


-Fully customisable protagonist, with visible equipment
-Fast paced physics-based combat against dozens of enemies simultaneously
-Upgrade your Swords, name them and grow along with them
-Bring loot and treasures from the future into the present and use them to upgrade your Camp and your Abilities!
-Destructible environment and enemies with ragdoll physics
-Full-fledged stat system with various build possibilities
-Dynamic dialogues that take actual in-game events into account

data.short_description: A Fast Paced 2.5D Pixel Art Roguelike with destructible environment, ragdolls, explosions and a thought proviking story inspired by the greatest JRPG stories of the early 2000s.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: TBD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Still work in progress! Will update after final tests on various hardware.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 Super
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Still work in progress! Will update after final tests on various hardware.

content_descriptors.notes: Pixel Art violence, characters fighting. Minor pixel blood visible.
